attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: IN THE NEWS WE HEAR OF THE PROPOSED  REBANDING OF PROPERTIES. MOST REGULAR PEOPLE HAVE PROBLEMS KEEPING UP WITH THE OVER INFLATED HOUSING MARKET AND IF REBANDING GOES AHEAD IT WILL KEEP FIRST TIME BUYERS FURTHER FROM THE HOUSING LADDER ALSO PENSIONERS AND PEOPLE ON BENEFITS IN FEAR OF MORE HUGE BILLS. THE PRESS REPORTS MP'S ALLOWING FORCED ENTRY INTO OUR HOMES TO EVALUATE/REBAND PROPERTY OR SKY CAMERAS BEING USED. THIS CANNOT BE THE WAY.

rejection.details: Please address the excessive use of capital letters, it makes the text hard to read.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
